mapper.insert: insert into detailorder_tb(od_num, pd_num, od_amount, od_price) values(#{od_num}, #{pd_num}, #{od_amount}, #{od_price})

insert into order_tb(od_num, mb_id, od_name, od_zipcode, od_addr, od_addr_d, od_phone, od_price, od_date) values(#{od_num}, #{mb_id}, #{od_name}, #{od_zipcode}, #{od_addr}, #{od_addr_d}, #{od_phone}, #{od_price}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select p.pd_img, p.pd_name, d.od_num, d.pd_num, d.od_amount, d.od_price, o.od_date, o.delivery from detailorder_tb d inner join order_tb o on d.od_num = o.od_num inner join product_tb p on d.pd_num = p.pd_num inner join detailorder_tb on d.od_price = p.pd_price where o.mb_id = #{mb_id} order by d.od_num desc, d.pd_num desc
select d.od_amount, d.pd_num, d.od_price, p.pd_name, p.pd_img, p.pd_price from detailorder_tb d inner join product_tb p on d.pd_num = p.pd_num where d.od_num = #{od_num}
